title: Calories in a Dunkin Donuts Boston Cream Donut

h1: Calories in a Dunkin Donuts Boston Cream Donut
assumptions: Standard Dunkin' Donuts Boston Kreme Donut (custard-filled, chocolate-glazed); values based on official or average reported data.

quick_answer.text: A Dunkin' Donuts Boston Cream Donut contains about 360 calories and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Without chocolate glaze (plain yeast donut base)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Dunkin Boston Cream Donut?
What are the carbs in a Dunkin Donuts Boston Cream Donut?
faqs.a: About 45 g carbs, including 20 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Boston Kreme Donut high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, it has 20 g total fat, with 9 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Dunkin Boston Cream Donut?
Does Dunkin have lower-calorie Boston Cream options?
faqs.a: No direct low-cal version, but tweaks like skipping glaze can reduce calories by 80.
